website_summaries.verdict: A solid freestanding heavy workout bag that offers more convenience over placement.
pros: Large base keeps the heavy bag upright
Can be filled to up to 140 lbs
Vinyl surface resists tearing during heavy abuse and strikes
Very solid and can take a beating without falling over
cons: The bottom base can be difficult to fill up with sand and works better with water alone

customer_reviews.title: I used a funnel and very fine white play sand
customer_reviews.text: Works well, it does move a little. I filled it with play sand. There is definitely no comparison between the bags found at a gym (which I would not expect), but for the cost, ease of having a bag in my home and not having to drive to the gym, I can deal with it. The reason for 4/5 stars is the pain it took to fill the base. It’s a very small hole. I used a funnel and very fine white play sand, that made things 100x easier.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for any type of heavy punching...
customer_reviews.text: Returned this after the 2nd day. If you are over 100lbs, and have a decent strength level this is not for you. I've boxed for several years and wanted something other than the wall mounted heavy bags due to my space constraints. This unit was way to easy to knock over, and the plastic center cylinder which holds this in place just is too wobbly. For a young person learning, or someone looking to tap on it, great. However even using a light more high speed scenario sequence, it just doesn't hold a hit well. I have ordered the Wavemaster XXL, and upon the first workout was overly impressed and will be keeping that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Paul DiFrancescantonio

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. WOULD GIVE 0 STARS IF OPTION
customer_reviews.text: not even a month and a half after purchase, this bag is broken completely bent on its side. ITS not like i have world class fighters using this bag, its amateurs and because the return window closed 30 days afterward, i have to pay to have it returned
customer_reviews.author: Manager

customer_reviews.title: I actually have started to use it myself and love it too
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son started taking karate classes this year and loves it, especially when they are punching and kicking the bags. So I surprised him with this for X-mas. I did a lot of research but I didn't want a bag moving around a lot when hit or kicked. Because of the spring it will bend and come back without moving across our floor. I actually have started to use it myself and love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag-but must be patient!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, great/sturdy materials. However, you will get frustrated putting sand into this unit!!! The size and location of the filing hole is (while necessarily placed for the finished product... Soi sand will not leak out) ridiculously annoying!! It takes FOREVER AND EVER to fill this thing because the sand simply does not flow into the base without constant shaking and vibrating! Outside of this, awesome bag! But buyer beware, you'll want to beat the crap out of this bag by the time you're done filing it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Crawford

customer_reviews.title: This is great.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Super easy to put togther. I just filled with hose water and they were ready to use it in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy CCR

customer_reviews.title: bounces around easily. The bottom part is impossible to fill with ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were heavier, bounces around easily. The bottom part is impossible to fill with rocks and sand, had to fill up with water in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag! The base does not move when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag! The base does not move when I hit or kick it really hard. Very easy to assemble - but I did use a few hundred pounds of sand to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: xteror

customer_reviews.title: You can not get parts of sopport if missing of damage.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it five star just to make sure everyone see this. I got this 3 month ago and moved my apartment and lost attachment of bag to the box. I called manufacture and they said they do not carry any parts and they are happy to sell me another one. Are you kidding? Also its too light that its workd fot under teenage child only. Not a adult bag. Dave your money and buy something solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steady. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who does taekwondo. He loves it. It is not too big, but very steady and fits nicely in the basement
customer_reviews.author: Dina N.

customer_reviews.title: Not great but ok
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal if your a power puncher or kicker than stay away from this product but if you want it for cardio and speed then this is the bag for you cheaply made also
customer_reviews.author: VitoWolverine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent free standing heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent free standing heavy bag. Has a flexible base post, allowing you to deliver hard hits without the bag tipping over. Have only had it for a few weeks, but very impressed so far. Less expensive than comparable Century brand product too. Base takes water or sand, water's easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don’t support broken parts
customer_reviews.text: We bought and used infrequently, used in a refinished basement. Piece that holds the bad to the base rusted and the metal ripped out. Incredibly cheap piece of metal on plastic. Called for support “we don’t make that part anymore, less than 3 years old. Terrible customer service, they do not back their product at all.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you respect the 30 degree angle bend in the bag. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: JMFigliolino

customer_reviews.title: Way too swingy
customer_reviews.text: I take a kickboxing class and wanted to practice at home so I got this bag. When I throw a punch I can’t throw a follow up punch because the bag sways so much. After kicking the bag I need to quickly get out of the way because it comes flying back at me. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Esti

customer_reviews.title: It just moves differently
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I filled base completely w water and it’s very stable. The best on the market for stability. However the bags motion is to be desired.. these free standing heavy bags just move differently than a traditional hanging bag.
customer_reviews.author: tags

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for my wife and i, we ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my wife and i, we filled it up with water and it has not moved at all..
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, safe, fun, effective
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Filled it with water. It's very steady, even when multiple kids are using it simultaneously. A fun workout.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Trees

customer_reviews.title: Super secure in home work out.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my home. Both me and my husband love this. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Roza

customer_reviews.title: Excess recoil
customer_reviews.text: I just put this thing together, filled with water and started using. But am VERY disappointed. It recoils far too much. The base is stable, so that's okay, but bag is unusable for me due to springiness. It is nothing like the solid freestanding bags I use in kickboxing class. I'm ready to drain water and send it back. Is there something I missed? Please help.
customer_reviews.author: John Lloyd Jones

customer_reviews.title: Kicking up a storm, Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, heavy duty and they perform as expected
customer_reviews.author: D M K

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and very high quality. My daughter 10 uses it for karate practice and I use it for exercise. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Surtz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag however...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered the bigger but accidentally ordered the smaller one and didn’t want to go through the hassle of exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: No parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing some parts and box was opened and closed with the tape several times...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A LITTLE PRICEY TO SHIP. IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just okay. It's VERY springy. It makes it near impossible to do rapid punches.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bags you can have and great price too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, it's durable and stands up to his training well... I'd recommend this product to anyone... it's above and beyond any other product of it's kind on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Warner

customer_reviews.title: I get a great workout everyday with this
customer_reviews.text: I get a great workout everyday with this. I weigh 215 lbs and this could take my shots at like an 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Pinzas

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag and pumped to have up and running
customer_reviews.text: Love my bag and pumped to have up and running. It is a very easy assembly but takes forever to fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: Jennessa Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Can you sen me to Mexico in a future???
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I will buy more of this.Hopely next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it purely from the standpoint of the terrible design for filling the base.
customer_reviews.author: tdog

customer_reviews.title: it was smart that they split the base so you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bet difficult to put water in this. However, it was smart that they split the base so you don't have to carry the whole thing when filled. You need a funnel to get water in to prevent spills. The bag is great though with the spring. It allows you to work on timing.
customer_reviews.author: Truthaholic

customer_reviews.title: Save for use
customer_reviews.text: Good for pure boxing even for the beginners. Small problem, it moves around a floor after strong punches ,it needs to be secured in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Shuryak

customer_reviews.title: You'll get a kick out of this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the gym we have in the garage. We have one family member who does MMA and this is a nice addition to the equipment we already have available. It was pretty easy to set up. The base is empty, and you can choose to fill it with either sand or water. (Or, my husband wittily suggested, Jell-O !) We picked sand because we were concerned that the base could potentially split and flood our storage area. (The base does seem strong.) Filling the base sections with sand is tedious, and you need the right funnel, but it's not tricky. Everything about this fitness bag looks strong and durable. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Esterhammer-Fic

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to add to your options in your home gym, this would make a great addition! It offers a different workout from stair climbers, treadmills and recumbent bikes. It adds variety to your workout and is perfect for both men and women. It was easy to fill using a funnel. We chose to use sand, but I have known people to use water as well. This is free standing and sturdy. I really thought that my husband would knock it over or destroy it within a few days, but that has not been the case at all. The design allows for even larger people to use this with success. Whether punching or kicking, this bag holds up.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This stand-up bag is awesome! It was very straightforward to assemble; I filled mine with water using a funnel from the garage and the garden hose. The base is actually two pieces that fit together once you fill them, which makes carrying them when full much easier than it would be if it were just one piece. All set up, this thing can take a punch. It has a nice give and feels good when you hit it. I use this withand it's a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Q

customer_reviews.title: Stable, good for kicking
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and weight for a home kickboxing bag. This is not that much smaller than the ones at my gym. But it is as stable. Probably my kicking is not as heavy as some. It is not as heavy as those at my gym, but I don't need someone to stand there on the other side of this bag. That makes it a lot more convenient -- being at home and not moving around on me. This stays where it is put. I filled this with water. I wasn't sure that was a good idea, just that it would be easier than sand.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition for my small basement gym. Easy to assemble and filling the base with water adds enough weight that it really stays in place when punching or kicking. Very sturdy and well made. If boxing, kicking or ny type of martial arts are in your workout routine, you may want to consider this well made unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This ASIN:B009O3SCFE Ringside Free-Standing Boxing MMA Fitness Workout Training Kicking Punching Heavy Bag is well made and lots of fun! It arrives in a tall box and requires only that the base be filled. This has a large striking area and stays standing. It is well made and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Darlaina Dancer

customer_reviews.title: We love to punch and kick this
customer_reviews.text: My family all takes karate. We love to punch and kick this. Helps us get our moves and punches on point. Doesn't tip over easy
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... fitness and martial arts and this punching bag is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My older son is into fitness and martial arts and this punching bag is perfect for him. You do need to fill the base with water as otherwise it just keeps tipping over when you punch it.
customer_reviews.author: Medianvalued

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Sturdy and bounce back is minimal. I opted to fill the bottom with water which has worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Frazier

product_meta.title: Ringside Freestanding Boxing Punching Heavy Bag
product_meta.description:
The Free-Standing Fitness Punching Bag is always ready for a solid, aerobic workout. Its free-standing design allows you to exercise where ever is most convenient. Perfect for the home gym. . The shock-absorbing foam is encased in a durable-- vinyl shell. Added base pad for protection when kicking bag. 15” x 56” of striking surface The plastic base tank can be filled with up to 140 pounds of water.The plastic base tank can be filled with up to 150 lbs of water or 240 lbs of sand

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Free-Standing Fitness Punching Bag is always ready for a solid, aerobic workout. Its free-standing design allows you to exercise where ever is most convenient. The shock-absorbing foam is encased in a durable, vinyl shell. Along with the added base pad, the bag offers a full 15” x 56” of striking surface, and the plastic base tank can be filled with up to 140 pounds of water.Additional shipping charges apply for this item. The exact amount is quoted at the checkout or by selecting to estimate your shipping charges in your shopping cart.
feature_bullets: The Free-Standing Fitness Punching Bag is always ready for a solid strength building aerobic fitness workout
Non-hanging heavy bag design allows you to exercise wherever is most convenient - perfect for your home or commercial gym
The shock-absorbing foam is encased in a durable vinyl shell and includes an added base pad for protection when kicking
The plastic base tank can be filled with up to 140 pounds of water to stand against even the strongest boxing and MMA strikes, knees and kicks
Unlike other free-standing bags this heavy bag can take a hit without falling over - Punch your way to a fit and healthy lifestyle with this solid heavybag

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
